pullrequest.title: implement screw joint in simbody and clean up screw joint constraint in ode

content.raw:
I must protest that including significant refactoring in a pull request that was already substantial makes it much less reviewable (I'm referring to [GS]etAttribute -> [GS]etParam and changing return type of [GS]et{Low|High}Stop).

In my mind, this should be 2 or 3 pull requests. Yes, the tests are currently passing, but I can't approve in good conscience something of this complexity.

I can help to split this into smaller pull requests.
